context.theme: Light warm theme with green primary (#8FBC8F)
components_to_build: Title, subtitle, WhatsApp CTA on right

user_stories.title: Restructure Hero to two-column layout
user_stories.description: Convert the current centered Hero layout to a two-column grid: animation/illustration on the LEFT, text content (title, subtitle, CTA) on the RIGHT. For RTL layout, this means illustration appears on the visual left side.
acceptance_criteria: Hero uses CSS Grid or Flexbox for two-column layout
Left column reserved for illustration
Right column contains title, subtitle, and WhatsApp CTA
Layout works correctly in RTL context
Section maintains full viewport height on desktop

user_stories.title: Add illustration with entrance animation
user_stories.description: Place hero-illustration.png in the left column with a polished Framer Motion entrance animation. The animation should complement the overall design and feel organic.
acceptance_criteria: hero-illustration.png displayed in left column
Framer Motion entrance animation (fade, slide, or scale)
Animation timing feels natural (0.6-1.2s duration)
Image is responsive and maintains aspect ratio
Animation does not block or delay text content

user_stories.title: Style title and subtitle in right column
user_stories.description: Position and style the headline and subheadline in the right column. Text should be right-aligned for RTL Hebrew, with proper typography hierarchy.
acceptance_criteria: Title uses existing Hebrew headline text
Subtitle uses existing Hebrew subheadline text
Text is right-aligned (RTL appropriate)
Typography hierarchy is clear (title larger than subtitle)
Uses existing color variables (--color-primary-dark, etc.)
Framer Motion staggered entrance animations

user_stories.title: Style WhatsApp CTA button
user_stories.description: Position the WhatsApp CTA button below the subtitle in the right column with proper styling and hover effects.
acceptance_criteria: WhatsApp button positioned below subtitle
Button uses primary color scheme
Hover/focus states with smooth transitions
WhatsApp icon visible
Framer Motion entrance animation (after title/subtitle)

user_stories.title: Implement responsive mobile layout
user_stories.description: Make the Hero section responsive for mobile devices. On smaller screens, stack the columns vertically with illustration on top, text content below.
acceptance_criteria: On mobile (< 768px): single column, stacked layout
Illustration appears above text content on mobile
Text remains readable on all screen sizes
Touch-friendly button sizing on mobile
Smooth breakpoint transitions

user_stories.title: Polish animations and visual refinements
user_stories.description: Fine-tune all animations, spacing, and visual details. Ensure the overall composition is balanced and professional.
acceptance_criteria: Animation sequence feels cohesive
Proper spacing and alignment throughout
No visual glitches or layout shifts
Performance: animations smooth at 60fps
Decorative elements (if any) complement the design

user_stories.title: Final verification and cleanup
user_stories.description: Run build, verify no TypeScript errors, and ensure the Hero section renders correctly.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build passes without errors
No TypeScript type errors
No console errors or warnings
Hero renders correctly on dev server
All previous acceptance criteria still met
